page.title: 02BURHAM - CHURCHES JOIN
page.content: In 1980 St. Mary's the Virgin Church Burham was pulled down because it was found unsafe after its recent five yearly check and beyond economical repair. After this decision was made the Church's congregation started to use the Methodist Church for the next few years. After discussion between the two Churches it was decided it would be good for the community for this arrangement of sharing the Methodist Church to be made permanent. They agreed to join together because of the size of the village and the amount of people using the Church is few. Also it would be fairly easy to carry out because the villagers know each other and in May 1984 a legal document was signed to make the sharing of the building official.
